Html:
Hello,

I have a solution built with prism, and yesterday i found this article. 

How can i use that idea with prism?

Something like .. separate modules and it's views to live in separate threads?

How can i make the communication with EventAggregator is i use multiple threads?

 

Thanks!

The following blog is specific to PRISM and using a separate thread to assist in resolving a performance issue (there is a demo app as well as webcast).   Perhaps this may provide you some ideas.

http://www.global-webnet.net/blogengine/post/2009/07/31/Does-PRISM-have-a-performance-issue.aspx
